item.title: Burberry shares pop 8% as British heritage pivot lures back U.S. shoppers
item.description: Burberry sales rose in the Americas in the fiscal first quarter, indicating green shoots in the embattled luxury brand's overhaul plans.

item.title: New York City braces for wealth flight with Mamdani's political rise
item.description: Zohran Mamdani's primary win in New York City's mayoral race and proposal to raise taxes on millionaires have touched off fears of a new wave of wealt...

item.title: Yen rebound subdues Japan luxury splurge at Cartier-owner Richemont
item.description: The Swiss luxury group's Japan sales declined 15% year-on-year in the fiscal first-quarter, even as wider group sales rose.

item.title: What Pres. Trump's new tax law means for your wallet

item.title: Tax cuts for private jet buyers expected to lead to surge in sales
item.description: The tax benefit, which revives a provision of the 2017 tax cuts, only applies to business jets, not jets used for personal use.
